name: Island Drug - South Whidbey - Covid Vaccine Site
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
You may come in at anytime during the vaccine clinic hours to receive your vaccine. Please do not worry there is plenty of vaccine available so you do not need to show up right as the clinic opens. If the line is long please consider coming back in a little later in the day.

If you do not upload your insurance at time of sign up please do so at www.islanddrug.com/up before you arrive for appointment.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Packwood Flea Market Johnson & Johnson Clinic
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
****This is primarily a JOHNSON & JOHNSON single dose vaccine clinic. **** and is by appointment or walk in. ++Moderna and Pfizer vaccine will also be available in limited quantities ++ However, any 1st Dose Moderna or Pfizer clients will need to seek their 2nd dose in 28 or 21 days respectively with an alternate provider/clinic.                                                                                          
Please note: Johnson & Johnson and Moderna vaccine can only be administered to individuals 18 years of age or older according CDC requirements. Minors aged 12 to 17 are now eligible to receive Pfizer vaccinations with a parent present.

This clinic is located at and hosted by Packwood Senior Center during the 2021 Packwood Flea Market in partnership with Lewis County DPHSS, WA DOH and WA National Guard. This is a walk up location. Please let us know if you or someone you are accompanying needs assistance of any kind.  **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation.

Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided.

If this is your 2nd dose Moderna or Pfizer vaccination please bring your vaccination card from your 1st dose visit. If you do not have your card you may register with and confirm proof of vaccination at https://wa.myir.net/                      
 Please do not come if you are feeling ill. Please arrive as close as possible to your scheduled time to prevent crowding that will impede appropriate social distancing. - It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Bird's Eye Medical-Pierce County Emergency Management COVID Vaccine Site
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Southwest Washington Fairgrounds
info: COVID-19 Moderna Vaccine. Must be 18 or older to register.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Hawker Center for Integrative Medicine - COVID Vaccine Clinic
info:
At the Hawker Center, we provide a warm oasis of peace and comfort, treating our patients and their stories with patience and respect. Imagine a spa-like atmosphere where a highly-trained doctor or nurse is administrating the COVID19 vaccination. That’s the Hawker Center difference.
***We currently are providing the 1st and 2nd doses of MODERNA.*** Please sign up for an appointment time.  Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay for 15 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction.***If you would like to find out more information about our clinic, please visit our website at www.hawkerhealth.com***
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: SPSCC 2011 Mottman Road SW, Olympia WA, 98512
info:
This is a Pfizer vaccination event for anyone age 12 and older. 

• This is a drive-thru clinic at South Puget Sound Community College (SPSCC), use the Crosby Blvd entrance. The clinic is from 8:00AM - 1:00PM. • All minors 12 to 17 years old must receive parent or guardian consent to receive a COVID-19 vaccine. This must be done in PrepMod when registering for an appointment. Parents or guardians do not have to be present at the time of vaccination if they signed the consent form online during registration. • Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with warm layers. • Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 15 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All Minors age 17 and Under must go to the Walk-in Tent located by the Admin Building. Ingresar por la puerta 15 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todos los menores de 17 años o menos deben ir a la carpa sin cita ubicada junto al edificio administrativo.*** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
